Your Personalized Recovery Plan

Heather is in the peak phase of shedding—when hair fall can feel relentless but is actually a sign of the cycle reacting, not ending. Ongoing perimenopausal changes and recent restrictive dieting are still sending mixed signals to her follicles, yet those can be steadied. This plan focuses on anchoring deeper sleep, rebuilding nutrition (iron and protein first), and calming hormonal stress so the shedding curve can finally turn toward stabilization. Every small action here helps her body feel safe to grow again. ✨

Start today—each routine brings your follicles closer to balance and visible strength.
